About

I am a Physics PhD student interested in collective behavior, computational neuroscience, and science outreach.

My background is Estonian-Canadian and I graduated from McGill University in Montreal, Canada with a degree in Mathematics and Physics in Spring 2013. In my spare time I thoroughly enjoy volleyball, meditation, making music, or ploughing through Haruki Murakami.

You can find my CV at the following address: jaan.io/cv.

The best way to reach me is via email at altosaar@princeton.edu. Please feel free to connect with me on the following networks: /linkedin: jaanaltosaar /github: altosaar
